staticText.text: Customer Please sign and print name
If this account goes into 60 days or more, there will be a finance charge of 10% on all overdue amounts. The finance charge will b charged monthly, until the account is paid in full.

Please pay directly to our bank account number :
Commercial Center, Gordon, NCD
Account: 1000-490283

The above named hereby apply for a loan to be made to me to enable me to acquire goods described in Part I of the Schedule hereto (“the goods”). The amount of the loans as set out in item 6 of Part II of the Scheduled (“ the Principal Sum”). I authorize you to make such inquiries concerning my credit worthiness as you may consider necessary. In the event that this Application is successful you may advance the loan by discharging my obligations in respect of the purchase of the Goods as detailed in Part II of the Schedule ( including the crediting of amounts owing to you as supplier of the goods and the payment of the relevant Stamp Duty to the appropriate Authority. The loan is repayable in accordance with the provisions set out in part III of the Schedule. I acknowledge that upon the loan being advanced as here in specified title to the Goods shall thereupon pass to me and the provisions of the Chattel Mortgage over the Goods executed by me today which is endorsed on the reverse of this Application shall thereupon and without any other notice or action on my part come in to full force and effect AND you are hereby authorized thereupon to date the said Chattel Mortgage and lodge the same for stamping and registration.
DATE this _______________________day of __________________20 ____________________
Courts (PNG) Limited, Head Office P.O BOX 1233 BOROKO NATIONAL CAPITAL DISTRICT PAPUA NEW GUINEA PH: +675 302 5800 FAX: +675 323 3336

Agreement made in duplicate/triplicate this Between Courts (PNG) Limited whose Registered Office is situated at Spring Garden Road, Gordons, Port Moresby (hereunder the “Lender” which expression shall include their successors and assigns), and

SIGNED SEALED and )
DELIVERED by the said )

In the presence of: -
SIGNATURE :
PRINTED NAME :
POSITION : CREDIT CLERK COURTS(PNG) LTD. P.O. Box 1233 Boroko, N.C.D.
